query:
SELECT 
  bg.eventoId,
  e.tipoEvento,
  e.dataEvento,
  COUNT(DISTINCT bg.id) as qtdGrupos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT bf.id) as qtdFormandos
FROM briefing_grupo bg
INNER JOIN eventos e ON bg.eventoId = e.id
LEFT JOIN briefing_formando bf ON bf.eventoId = bg.eventoId
WHERE e.turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654')
GROUP BY bg.eventoId, e.tipoEvento, e.dataEvento;

INNER JOIN eventos e ON bg.eventoId = e.id
